flawed_nl_solution:
She has 120 minutes to practice because 2 x 60 = <<2*60=120>>120
She has already spent 93 minutes on her work because 30 + 25 + 38 = <<30+25+38=93>>93
She has 72 minutes to use on finger exercise because 120-93 = <<120-93=72>>72

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 27, not 72. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
